doc.after: In 2008 the IUCN changed its assessment of the killer whale s conservation status from conservation dependent to data deficient recognizing that one or more killer whale types may actually be separate endangered species 2 Depletion of prey species pollution large scale oil spills and habitat disturbance caused by noise and conflicts with boats are currently the most significant worldwide threats 2
